title: Abacavir
summary: Abacavir, sold under the brand name Ziagen, is a medication used to prevent and treat HIV/AIDS.[1][2] Similar to other nucleoside analog reverse-transcriptase inhibitors (NRTIs), abacavir is used together with other HIV medications, and is not recommended by itself.[3] It is taken by mouth as a tablet or solution and may be used in children over the age of three months.[1][4]
